resources.string:
Made by Sven Uitendaal as a project at the minor programming at the UvA. 

You can search songs to see lyrics, record and some samples and save the total record. 

Start recording by pressing the record button. Stop recording by pressing it again. When the first sample is recorded the recorder starts recording at the start of the loop and the maximum sample recording time is the duration of the first sample. 

Listen to your recorded songs in My recordings. You can play them once or you can loop them. On long press you can delete a recording.
No samples recorded, please record samples first
